name: Qodeium Game Engine (Pre-Alpha 1.0)
description:
Qodeium is a code editor that allows you to code in QodeCommand++ that is a custom made programming language.  Qodeium is currently in pre-alpha 1.0, and I will try to update the game engine as soon as possible.

How can I learn QodeCommand++?

Well, you could learn it from my channel DaveTM, or learn it from the official hand-written tutorial from Qodeium itself, altho it is pretty outdated.
